# Checklist

## General
- [ ] Naming conventions followed (camelCase/snake_case)
- [ ] No secrets committed
- [ ] Documentation updated if needed

## Backend (if applicable)
- [ ] RLS with `withUserContext()` for protected tables
- [ ] Domain models use factory pattern
- [ ] Migration generated (`npm run db:generate`)

## Frontend (if applicable)
- [ ] Context API used (no duplicate API calls)
- [ ] Theme system used (`styles/theme.ts`)
- [ ] i18n translations added (en.json, ja.json)

## Shared (if applicable)
- [ ] Types exported from `@app/shared`
- [ ] Content arrays used
